com.epoch.textbooks

Class TextChapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.textbooks.TextChapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, TextbookConstants

    public class TextChapter
extends Object
implements TextbookConstants
    A chapter in a textbook.

        public TextContent deleteContent(int posn,
                                 boolean moving)
        Deletes a piece of content.
        Parameters:
        posn - 1-based position of content to delete
        moving - when true, simply moving the contents, not deleting them
        Returns:
        the deleted piece of content

      • deleteContents

      • deleteContents

        Deletes a range of pieces of content.

        range - 1-based inclusive range of positions of content to delete

        Returns:
        list of the deleted pieces of content
